agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Defense & Veterans' Affairs TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral if permission granted Monday, March 25, 2019 PLACE: E1.026 CHAIR: Rep. Dan Flynn HB 1349 Oliverson Relating to the reemployment of a Civil Air Patrol member after training or duty with the Civil Air Patrol. HB 1593 Bell, Cecil Relating to the Texas State Guard uniform and insignia fund. HB 1725 Huberty Relating to retired members of the Texas State Guard. HB 1837 Hefner Relating to the designation of a portion of U.S. Highway 67 in Titus County as the Titus County World War II Veterans Memorial Highway. HB 1838 Hefner Relating to the designation of a portion of U.S. Highway 271 in Titus County as the Titus County Korean War Veterans Memorial Highway. HB 2530 Flynn Relating to the development by the Texas Veterans Commission of an online repository of information of use to active duty military relocating to this state. HB 2535 Flynn Relating to the Texas Military Preparedness Commission. HB 2941 Guillen Relating to requiring each state agency to post on the agency's Internet website information on suicide prevention for certain individuals. HCR 74 Lozano Urging Congress to enact H.R. 613/S. 164, the TRICARE Reserve Select Improvement Act. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
